form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/2/2023 FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 OPTIONAL OF ) (English) (Rev. 6-82) DEPT. OF STATE APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION 50230-105 INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be completed by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $125.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name First name Middle name DESAI GAJRABEN THAKORBHAI 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) DESAI G.AJRABEN 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) DES E2115 21821619 sitizinies 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 13 JULY 1901 87 VESMA GUJARAT INDIA 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status INDIAN Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Including my present marriage, I have been married free times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address TOY HOUSE, GULAB BAUG, NIL K. D. ROAD, BOMBAY. 400 056. MAHARASHTRA. 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) DESAI THAKOR BHAI GHELABHAI (DECEASED) Date and place of marriage 26 FEB. 1910 PALSANA, GUJARAT, INDIA 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children 2 DECEMBER 1922 (DATE OF BIRTH), VESMA, GUJARAT, INDIA (PLACE OF BIRTH) SUMANBHAI THAKORBHAI GHELABHAI DESAI (SON) PPESENT ADDRESS: 4719 W. PARKER AVE. CHICAGO 16.-60639, U.S.A. 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow 15. Final address in the United States me to the United States 4719 W. PARKER AVE. NONE CHICAGO 11.60639 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address, and relationship, 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If if any) SUMANBHAI THAKORBHAI DESAI (SON) different from 16) PRABHA S. DESAI, 4719 W. PARKER AVE., CHICAGO, 4719 W. PARKER AVE, IL 60639, U.S.A. CHICAGO IL. 60639, U.S.A. 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair GREY (c) Height 5 feet / NONE inches (b) Color of eyes BLACK (d) Complexion FAIR 20. Purpose in going to the United States TOLIVE WITH MY ONLY SON. 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? PERMANENTLY CHICAGO NO THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA NSN 7540-00-149-0919 Previous edition not usable
